results.content: Until the moment I enjoy the course. I am disagree with some comments like "full copy paste" because I think that the instructor assume you have some basic knowledge as : css frameworks, react, node js. Fimally, I recommend this course.
results.content_html: Until the moment I enjoy the course. I am disagree with some comments like "full copy paste" because I think that the instructor assume you have some basic knowledge as : css frameworks, react, node js. Fimally, I recommend this course.

results.content: It was ok, but you need to explain yourself more instead of just instructing your students on what code to copy & paste or write in their editors. Also, some video editing would help, the constant "actuallies" are pretty annoying. That said, it's a decent introduction.

response.content: Hello Maria, thank you for giving my first course a review! I sincerely apologize if this course did not fully satisfy you. (Apologies for the "actuallies" too) However, if there's something I can do to help you, please let me know and I'll be glad to help :)
